code_info: Lot # D22151011     Best by date: 03/02/2023    Due to variations in equipment on the production line, the lot code and best by date can be found on either the top or bottom of the wrapper near one of the crimped ends. Explanation of code: D = product is for domestic use only; 22 = year product manufactured; 151 = Julian date product manufactured; 01 = production line; 1 = shift product manufactured
